Verses: 1 avvelaiyile Seeshargal Yesuvinidaththil Vandhu: Paralogaraajyaththil Evan Periyavanaayiruppaan Endru Kettaargal.
2 yesu Oru Siru Pillaiyaith Thammidaththil Azhaiththu: Adhai Avargal Naduve Niruththi:
3 neengal Manandhirumbip Pillaigalaippol Aagaavittaal, Paralogaraajyaththil Piravesikkamaatteergal Endru Meyyaagave Ungalukku Sollugiren.
4 aagaiyaal Indhappillaiyaippolath Thannaith Thaazhththugiravan Evano, Avane Paralogaraajyaththil Periyavanaayiruppaan.
5 ippadippatta Oru Pillaiyai En Naamaththinimiththam Etrukkollugiravan Ennai Etrukkollugiraan.

6 ennidaththil Visuvaasamaayirukkira Indha Siriyaril Oruvanukku Idaralundaakkugiravan Evano, Avanudaiya Kazhuththil Endhirakkallaik Katti, Samuththiraththin Aazhaththile Avanai Amizhththugiradhu Avanukku Nalamaayirukkum.
7 idaralkalinimiththam Ulagaththukku Aiyo, Idaralgal Varuvadhu Avasiyam. Aanaalum Endha Manushanaal Idaral Varugiradho, Avanukku Aiyo!

8 un Kaiyaavadhu Un Kaalaavadhu Unakku Idaralundaakkinaal, Adhaith Thariththu Erindhupodu; Nee Irandu Kaiyudaiyavanaai, Alladhu Irandu Kaaludaiyavanaai Niththiya Akkiniyile Thallappaduvadhaippaarkkilum, Sappaaniyaai, Alladhu Oonanaai, Niththiya Jeevanukkul Piravesippadhu Unakku Nalamaayirukkum.
9 un Kan Unakku Idaralundaakkinaal, Adhaip Pidungi Erindhupodu; Irandu Kannullavanaai, Erinaragaththil Thallappaduvadhaippaarkkilum, Otraikkannanaai Jeevanukkul Piravesippadhu Unakku Nalamaayirukkum.

10 indha Siriyaril Oruvanaiyum Arpamaai Ennaadhapadikku Echcharikkaiyaayirungal; Avargalukkuriya Thevadhoodhargal Paralogaththile En Paramapidhaavin Samugaththai Eppozhudhum Tharisikkiraargal Endru Ungalukku Sollugiren.
11 manushakumaaran Kettupponadhai Ratchikka Vandhaar.

12 ungalukku Eppadith Thondrugiradhu? Oru Manushanukku Nooru Aadugalirukka, Avaigalil Ondru Sidharipponaal, Avan Matrath Thonnootronpadhu Aadugalaiyum Malaigalil Vittuppoi Sidharipponadhaith Thedaamaliruppaano?

13 avan Adhaikkandupidiththaal, Sidharippogaadha Thonnootronpadhu Aadugalaikkuriththu Sandhoshappadugiradhaip Paarkkilum, Adhaikkuriththu Adhigamaai Sandhoshappaduvaan Endru, Meyyaagave Ungalukku Sollugiren.
14 ivvidhamaaga, Indhach Siriyaril Oruvanaagilum Kettuppovadhu Paralogaththilirukkira Ungal Pidhaavin Siththamalla.

15 un Sagodharan Unakku Virodhamaagak Kutranjeydhaal, Avanidaththil Nee Poi, Neeyum Avanum Thaniththirukkaiyil, Avan Kutraththai Avanukku Unarththu; Avan Unakkuch Sevikoduththaal, Un Sagodharanai Aadhaayappaduththikkondaai.
16 avan Sevikodaamarponaal, Irandu Moondru Saatchigaludaiya Vaakkinaale Sangadhigalellaam Nilaivarappadumpadi, Irandoruvarai Unnudane Koottikkondu Po.
17 avargalukkum Avan Sevikodaamarponaal, Adhai Sabaikkuth Theriyappaduththu; Sabaikkum Sevikodaadhiruppaanaanaal, Avan Unakku Agngnaaniyaippolavum Aayakkaaranaippolavum Iruppaanaaga.

18 boologaththile Neengal Evaigalaik Kattuveergalo Avaigal Paralogaththilum Kattappattirukkum; Boologaththile Neengal Evaigalaik Kattavizhppeergalo Avaigal Paralogaththilum Kattavizhkkappadum Endru Meyyaagave Ungalukku Sollugiren.

19 allaamalum, Ungalil Iranduper Thaangal Vendikkollappogira Endhak Kaariyaththaikkuriththaagilum Boomiyile Orumanappattirundhaal, Paralogaththilirukkira En Pidhaavinaal Adhu Avargalukku Undaagum Endru Ungalukku Sollugiren.
20 enenil, Irandu Peraavadhu Moondru Peraavadhu En Naamaththinaale Enge Koodiyirukkiraargalo, Ange Avargal Naduvile Irukkiren Endraar.
21 appozhudhu, Pedhuru Avaridaththil Vandhu, Aandavare, En Sagodharan Enakku Virodhamaaik Kutranjeydhu Vandhaal, Naan Eththanaidharam Mannikkavendum? Ezhudharamattumo Endru Kettaan.
22 adharku Yesu: Ezhudharamaaththiram Alla, Ezhezhupadhudharamattum Endru Unakku Sollugiren.
23 eppadiyenil, Paralogaraajyam Than Oozhiyakkaararidaththil Kanakkuppaarkka Vendumendrirundha Oru Raajaavukku Oppaayirukkiradhu.
24 avan Kanakkuppaarkkath Thodanginapodhu, Padhinaayiram Thaalandhu Kadan Pattavan Oruvanai Avanukku Munbaaga Konduvandhaargal.
25 kadanaiththeerkka Avanukku Nirvaagam Illaadhapadiyaal, Avanudaiya Aandavan Avanaiyum Avan Penjaadhi Pillaigalaiyum, Avanukku Undaana Ellaavatraiyum Vitru, Kadanaith Theerkkumpadik Kattalaiyittaan.
26 appozhudhu, Andha Oozhiyakkaaran Thaazha Vizhundhu, Vanangi: Aandavane! Ennidaththil Porumaiyaayirum, Ellaavatraiyum Umakkuk Koduththuth Theerkkiren Endraan.
27 andha Oozhiyakkaaranudaiya Aandavan Manadhirangi, Avanai Vidudhalaippanni, Kadanaiyum Avanukku Manniththuvittaan.

28 appadiyirukka, Andha Oozhiyakkaaran Purappattuppogaiyil, Thannidaththil Nooru Vellippanam Kadanpattirundhavanaagiya Than Udan Velaikkaararil Oruvanaikkandu, Avanaippidiththu, Thondaiyai Neriththu: Nee Patta Kadanai Enakku Koduththuth Theerkkavendum Endraan.
29 appozhudhu Avanudaiya Udan Velaikkaaran Avan Kaalile Vizhundhu: Ennidaththil Porumaiyaayirum, Ellaavatraiyum Umakkuk Koduththuth Theerkkiren Endru, Avanai Vendikkondaan.
30 avano Sammadhiyaamal, Poi, Avan Patta Kadanaik Koduththuth Theerkkumalavum Avanaik Kaavalil Potuviththaan.
31 nadandhadhai Avan Udanvelaikkaarar Kandu, Migavum Thukkappattu, Aandavanidaththil Vandhu, Nadandhadhaiyellaam Ariviththaargal.
32 appozhudhu, Avanudaiya Aandavan Avanai Azhaippiththu: Pollaadha Oozhiyakkaarane, Nee Ennai Vendikkondapadiyinaal, Andhak Kadan Muzhuvadhaiyum Unakku Manniththuvitten.
33 naan Unakku Iranginadhupola, Neeyum Un Udan Velaikkaaranukku Irangavendaamo Endru Solli,
34 avanudaiya Aandavan Kobamadaindhu, Avan Patta Kadanaiyellaam Thanakkuk Koduththuth Theerkkumalavum Ubaadhikkiravargalidaththil Avanai Oppukkoduththaan.
35 neengalum Avanavan Than Sagodharan Seydha Thappidhangalai Manappoorvamaai Manniyaamarponaal, En Paramapidhaavum Ungalukku Ippadiye Seyvaar Endraar.
